column4: http://students.estrellamountain.edu/larson/help/symlinks.htm "ln seattle emerald-city RET" This command makes a hard link from an existing file, `seattle', to a new file, `emerald-city'. You can read and edit file `emerald-city' just as you would `seattle'; any changes you make to `emerald-city' are also written to `seattle' (and vice versa).
